games.title: Banished
games.description: In this city-building strategy game, you control a group of exiled travelers who decide to restart their lives in a new land. They have only the clothes on their backs and a cart filled with supplies from their homeland. The townspeople of Banished are your primary resource.

reviews.author: IGN
reviews.comment: Great game, but could be better

reviews.author: IGN
reviews.comment: Great game, but could be better

games.title: Human: Fall Flat
games.description: Human: Fall Flat is a quirky open-ended physics-based puzzle platformer set in floating dreamscapes. Your goal is to find the exit of these surreal levels by solving puzzles with nothing but your wits. Local co-op for 2 players and up to 8 online for even more mayhem!

specs.Processor: Intel Core2 Quad Q9300 (4 * 2500) or equivalent | AMD A10-5800K APU (4*3800) or equivalent

games.title: Dead Cells
games.description: Dead Cells is a rogue-lite, metroidvania inspired, action-platformer. You'll explore a sprawling, ever-changing castle... assuming youre able to fight your way past its keepers in 2D souls-lite combat. No checkpoints. Kill, die, learn, repeat.

specs.Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better

games.title: Battlefield: Bad Company 2
games.description: Battlefield: Bad Company 2 brings the award-winning Battlefield gameplay to the forefront of PC gaming with best-in-class vehicular combat and unexpected lefield moments. vehicles like the ATV and a transport helicopter allow for all-new multiplayer tactics on the Battlefield. With the Frostbite-enabled Destruction 2.

specs.Graphics: 512 MB Video Card (GeForce GTX 260/ ATI Radeon 4870)

games.title: XCOM 2
games.description: XCOM 2 is the sequel to XCOM: Enemy Unknown, the 2012 award-winning strategy game of the year. Earth has changed and is now under alien rule. Facing impossible odds you must rebuild XCOM, and ignite a global resistance to reclaim our world and save humanity.

games.title: Mad Max
games.description: Play as Mad Max, a reluctant hero and survivor who wants nothing more than to leave the madness behind and find solace.

games.title: Frostpunk
games.description: Frostpunk is the first society survival game. As the ruler of the last city on Earth, it is your duty to manage both its citizens and its infrastructure. What decisions will you make to ensure your society's survival? What will you do when pushed to breaking point? Who will you become in the process?

games.description: Choose your fate in Assassin's Creed Odyssey. From outcast to living legend, embark on an odyssey to uncover the secrets of your past and change the fate of Ancient Greece.

games.title: Left 4 Dead 2
